title: Li Yuehong
data: Li Yuehong (Chinese: 李越宏; pinyin: Lǐ Yuèhóng; born 28 August 1989) is a Chinese sport shooter and three-time Olympic medalist. Li won bronze in the 25 metre rapid fire pistol event at the 2016 Summer Olympics.[1] He won bronze in the same event at the 2020 Summer Olympics.[2] In the same event at the 2024 Summer Olympics, his third appearance, he won the gold medal.[3] With a score of 39, Li is the world record holder in the final of the 25 metre rapid fire pistol event, set in Baku in August 2023.[3] This biographical article relating to sport shooting in the People's Republic of China is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
